title: Controlled by His Voice Box Set
description: ***The COMPLETE Controlled by His Voice series is now available as a boxed set. All 5 books together in one HOT and STEAMY bundle!***  It all started with two little words on a blank piece of paper with a phone number taped to a wall:  Submission training.  But it became so much more.  Those two little words drove Meghan crazy as she finished her final semester of college.  Convinced she had it all... a great boyfriend, a promising career, and a fulfilled life... Meghan eventually called the number. There she heard a voice.  HIS voice.  The voice that changed her life forever, shattering her identity and propelling her into a world of dark deviant bliss.  Meghan eventually meets the billionaire behind the voice, a tortured soul who takes her on a stratospheric ride of emotions and steamy adventures as she is forced to confront who she really is and what she really wants... at the command of a man who sends her into ecstatic delight with just the sound of his voice.  But when Meghan discovers the demons that haunt him, she is faced with the biggest challenge of her life. Not only does she need to come to terms with her own fears, she needs to reach into a disturbed mind to save a damaged man from his own self.  Content Warning: This erotic romance contains graphic scenes of intimacy. For mature adults 18 years and older ONLY!  Themes: New Adult, College, Steamy Romance, Age Gap, Billionaire, Alpha Male.
author: Skylar Cross
